title: Yosemite Valley
description: Yosemite Valley is a glacial valley in California's Sierra Nevada mountains, celebrated for its iconic granite cliffs, waterfalls, and unique biodiversity.

title: Milford Sound / Piopiotahi
description: Milford Sound is a breathtaking fjord in New Zealand's South Island, renowned for its dramatic cliffs, cascading waterfalls, and stunning natural beauty.

title: Cataratas del Iguazú / Cataratas do Iguaçu
description: Iguazú Falls is a colossal system of waterfalls straddling the border of Brazil and Argentina, renowned for its awe-inspiring beauty and power.

title: Salzburg
description: Salzburg is an Austrian city known for its baroque architecture, historic birthplace of Mozart, and the picturesque backdrop of the Alps.

title: Efes
description: Ephesus is an ancient Greek city in modern-day Turkey, renowned for its grand ruins, including the Temple of Artemis, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.
